Package io.proximax.sdk.model.transaction

Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.proximax.sdk.model.transaction.Transaction
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AccountLinkTransaction, AccountMetadataTransaction, AggregateTransaction, AliasTransaction, BlockchainConfigTransaction, BlockchainUpgradeTransaction, ExchangeOfferAddTransaction, ExchangeOfferRemoveTransaction, ExchangeOfferTransaction, LockFundsTransaction, ModifyAccountPropertyTransaction, ModifyContractTransaction, ModifyMetadataTransaction, ModifyMosaicLevyTransaction, ModifyMultisigAccountTransaction, MosaicDefinitionTransaction, MosaicMetadataTransaction, MosaicSupplyChangeTransaction, NamespaceMetadataTransaction, RegisterNamespaceTransaction, RemoveMosaicLevyTransaction, SecretLockTransaction, SecretProofTransaction, TransferTransaction
    public abstract class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract transaction class that serves as the base class of all NEM transactions.
    Since:
    1.0

      • getMaxFee

        public java.math.BigInteger getMaxFee()
        Returns the fee for the transaction. The higher the fee, the higher the priority of the transaction. Transactions with high priority get included in a block before transactions with lower priority.
        Returns:
        fee amount

      • getSignature

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> getSignature()

        Returns:
        transaction signature

        Returns:

      • getSerializedSize

        protected int getSerializedSize()
        get number of bytes the transaction will get serialized to
        Returns:
        the number of bytes after serialization

      • getPayloadSerializedSize

        protected abstract int getPayloadSerializedSize()
        payload size is number of bytes to which the actual transaction data will be serialized to. This does not include transaction header.
        Returns:
        size of serialized payload

      • generateBytes

        protected abstract byte[] generateBytes()
        generate byte array with serialized form of transaction
        Returns:
        byte array
